name: colorsgames
author: Purdey Chambraud <purdey.chambraud@gmail.com>
description: The aim is to find out the color code of a random generated color in rgb, hsl or hex. There are two modes: limited time or limited hits allowed With 3 levels of difficulty!.

scripts.build: npm run clean && parcel build index.html  --public-url https://purdeychambraud.com/color-game/
